Title: Grandma Hanrath'S Banana Breadfort Collins, Colorado  

Ingredients: ["1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "2 eggs (add one at a time)", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. soda", "2 c. flour", "1/4 c. nuts", "2 over-ripe bananas (chopped)"]
